scripts.codegen:mainnet: npm run prepare:mainnet && graph codegen --output-dir src/types/ subgraph.mainnet.yaml
scripts.codegen:goerli: npm run prepare:goerli && graph codegen --output-dir src/types/ subgraph.goerli.yaml
scripts.codegen:matic: npm run prepare:matic && graph codegen --output-dir src/types/ subgraph.matic.yaml
scripts.build:mainnet: npm run codegen:mainnet && graph build subgraph.mainnet.yaml
scripts.build:goerli: npm run codegen:goerli && graph build subgraph.goerli.yaml
scripts.build:matic: npm run codegen:matic && graph build subgraph.matic.yaml
scripts.deploy:hosting:mainnet: npm run build:mainnet && graph deploy --product hosted-service ciety-xyz/omnuum-mainnet subgraph.mainnet.yaml
scripts.deploy:hosting:goerli: npm run build:goerli && graph deploy --product hosted-service ciety-xyz/omnuum-goerli subgraph.goerli.yaml
scripts.deploy:hosting:matic: npm run build:matic && graph deploy --product hosted-service ciety-xyz/omnuum-matic subgraph.matic.yaml
scripts.deploy:hosting:ddevkim:mainnet: npm run build:mainnet && graph deploy --product hosted-service ddevkim/omnuum-mainnet subgraph.mainnet.yaml
scripts.deploy:hosting:ddevkim:goerli: npm run build:goerli && graph deploy --product hosted-service ddevkim/omnuum-goerli subgraph.goerli.yaml
scripts.deploy:hosting:ddevkim:matic: npm run build:matic && graph deploy --product hosted-service ddevkim/omnuum-matic subgraph.matic.yaml
